verbs.description: just in hospitals to [V: be] shut as health workers vow to join nlc in nationwide strike we call on all our members nationwide to remain resolute and be committed to the effective and orderly implementation of the nation - wide strike commencing tomorrow except the government has a change of heart before then josiah added union of nigeria government sahara reporters africa medical and health workers president nigeria nigeria labour congress biobelemoye josiah
